message: Some of these responses are unbelievable. Michelle Obama tried to start a good thing to nourish your kids. She can't police what each district puts in their lunches. You are all at choice. If your kids won't eat what's served, let them learn some life skills - make their own lunches at home and quit complaining. Geez!

By supporting Trump so tenaciously the Republican Party has shown its true colors more clearly than ever before......they are a morally bankrupt party that has no interest in the well being of this country.
I thought YOU called it Boxing Day?..
I'm also not sure """"depict"""" is the word you're looking for.
North Korea, Asia's version of a five year old having a temper tantrum kicking the back of your airline seat. Our's is Donald Trump.
aww im happy for her! Did you watch sweetie pies?

do not go back

And the beat goes on. How about if we all call gun control """"gun safety"""". Pretending like the government is going to take away everyone's guns keeps people from using common sense. Most Americans favor gun safety--people should be made aware of how many are killed very week due to carelessness.
Or just let them be , animal captivity is cruel too

The other thing that nobody seems to be catching on is there's not going to be another election because all he has to do is call martial law and he's not going anywhere....... so everybody that voted for him great job idoits
Surrender is IMMINENT

Land of the free and no regulations, this is what you get. By law you must have insurance and registration on your car. But phone Apps, not a chance. Wait till the databases of collected mobile phone numbers get compiled from hacking to spam you with this crap - and then threaten you with it. The virus threat is huge and of course the ultimate - RansomWare, threaten you with bad reviews unless you pay up. This folks, is just the beginning of the end of smart phone freedom. And then the far right will really want to monitor your smart phone. Afterall, if Yelp can track you, why can't the gvt? Many Regulations and legal monitoring of phones is only when it suits extreme views (left or right). And this isn't going to be just an American problem, but global.Organized crime gangs and hackers will have a field day. Those spam txt messages you receive (cuz you probably posted your mobile number on Facebook) is already in the millions of txt per day. With Yelp, it will jump to 100 million per day. And wait until the company gets hacked. Game over.
Don't like what I am seeing and hearing.
He will never be president. Period.
add me guys
